subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The 2010 soccer World Cup starts, in a sense, this year. There are 75 qualifying matches scheduled around the world for Saturday and Wednesday, and some of them have become eliminators.
snippet: The 2010 soccer World Cup starts, in a sense, this year. There are 75 qualifying matches scheduled around the world for Saturday and Wednesday, and some of them have become eliminators.
